title: Cardamom and lemon stamped cookies
description: We discovered that cardamom is a really popular spice in Norway, used in many cake and biscuit recipes. Some say the spice was first brought back to the country hundreds of years ago by Vikings who worked as mercenaries in what was then Constantinople (now Istanbul). Whatever the truth, Norwegians are certainly keen on their cardamom.We made these cookies on a boat on the Geiranger Fjord – a stunning spot.
ingredients: 3 tsp ground cardamom or 1 heaped tsp cardamom seeds, ground in a pestle and mortar
